Package ru.ifmo.rain.naumov.implementor

Class JarImplementor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.ifmo.rain.naumov.implementor.JarImplementor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Impler, JarImpler
    public class JarImplementor
extends java.lang.Object
implements JarImpler
    An implementation of JarImpler â€” making a default implementation of a class or interface given with implement(java.lang.Class<?>,java.nio.file.Path) or implementJar(java.lang.Class<?>,java.nio.file.Path)

      • getMethodSet

        private static java.util.HashSet<JarImplementor.MethodWrapper> getMethodSet​(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                                                                            java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Class<?>,​java.lang.reflect.Method[]> function,
                                                                            java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Integer> predicate,
                                                                            java.util.function.Supplier<java.util.HashSet<JarImplementor.MethodWrapper>> supplier)
        A helping function to return a set of methods of a class being implemeneted. It applies a given function to a class token returning an array of methods, which are filtered with a predicate and wrapped by a JarImplementor.MethodWrapper
        Parameters:
        token - a class being implemented
        function - function applied to a token returning an array of methods
        predicate - a predicate by which a resulting array is filtered
        supplier - a supplier providing a hashset to collect the results
        Returns:
        a hash set got performing described operations

      • getMethodSet

        private static java.util.HashSet<JarImplementor.MethodWrapper> getMethodSet​(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                                                                            java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Integer> predicate)
        Collects a set of methods to implement of a class
        Parameters:
        token - a token of a class being implemented
        predicate - which methods should be considered
        Returns:
        a hash set of methods to implement of a class being implemented

      • writeBody

        private static void writeBody​(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                              java.io.Writer writer)
                       throws ImplerException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Writes a body of a class using a given writer. Body mainly contains methods and constructors.
        Parameters:
        token - a token of a class being implemented
        writer - a writer being used to write the results
        Throws:
        ImplerException - if there are no appropriate constructors in a class to implement
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurred trying to write using a given writer

      • implement

        public void implement​(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                      java.nio.file.Path root)
               throws ImplerException
        Produces code implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

        Generated class classes name should be same as classes name of the type token with Impl suffix added. Generated source code should be placed in the correct subdirectory of the specified root directory and have correct file name. For example, the implementation of the interface List should go to $root/java/util/ListImpl.java

        Specified by:
        implement in interface Impler
        Parameters:
        token - type token to create implementation for.
        root - root directory.
        Throws:
        ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

      • implementJar

        public void implementJar​(java.lang.Class<?> token,
                         java.nio.file.Path jarFile)
                  throws ImplerException
        Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

        Generated class classes name should be same as classes name of the type token with Impl suffix added.

        Specified by:
        implementJar in interface JarImpler
        Parameters:
        token - type token to create implementation for.
        jarFile - target .jar file.
        Throws:
        ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Implements a given class and stores it in a given path. Usage: <options> <class name> <path to store> Without any flags you get a java source file implementation. And using -jar option you get a jar file implementation.
        Parameters:
        args - arguments of a described rules
